OtherComments.Content: Unmapped Tabular Figures This script will insert ten unmapped glyphs for Tabular Figures (tnum) and compose them from the default figures, setting the advanced widths to the width of figure zero and centering each glyph within the advance width.

GlyphInsertGlyphs.GlyphNames: zero.tnum, one.tnum, two.tnum, three.tnum, four.tnum, five.tnum, six.tnum, seven.tnum, eight.tnum, nine.tnum,
